titles.title: Exemplary Breastfeeding Support Act
To amend section 17 of the Child Nutrition Act of 1966 (42 U.S.C. 1786) to promote and support breastfeeding.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Healthy Families and Communities.

committee.name: House Committee on Education and Labor

bill.summary: 9/22/2009--Introduced. Exemplary Breastfeeding Support Act - Amends the Child Nutrition Act of 1966 to direct the Secretary of Health and Human Services (HHS) to implement programs in support of breastfeeding in the special supplemental nutrition program for women, infants, and children (WIC).
